templates.name: Vaultwarden

templates.name: Authentik
templates.description: An open-source Identity Provider focused on flexibility and versatility.
templates.composeContent:
services:
  postgresql:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - authentik_db:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    environment:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${PG_PASS:-changeme}
      POSTGRES_USER: authentik
      POSTGRES_DB: authentik

  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - authentik_redis:/data

  server:
    image: ghcr.io/goauthentik/server:latest
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server
    environment:
      AUTHENTIK_REDIS__HOST: redis
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__HOST: postgresql
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__USER: authentik
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__NAME: authentik
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__PASSWORD: ${PG_PASS:-changeme}
      AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY: ${AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY:-changeme}
    volumes:
      - authentik_media:/media
      - authentik_templates:/templates
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
      - "9443:9443"
    depends_on:
      - postgresql
      - redis

  worker:
    image: ghcr.io/goauthentik/server:latest
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: worker
    environment:
      AUTHENTIK_REDIS__HOST: redis
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__HOST: postgresql
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__USER: authentik
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__NAME: authentik
      AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__PASSWORD: ${PG_PASS:-changeme}
      AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY: ${AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY:-changeme}
    volumes:
      - authentik_media:/media
      - authentik_templates:/templates
    depends_on:
      - postgresql
      - redis

volumes:
  authentik_db:
  authentik_redis:
  authentik_media:
  authentik_templates:

templates.name: WireGuard
templates.description: Fast, modern, secure VPN tunnel. Simple and easy to configure.

templates.name: Pi-hole
templates.description: Network-wide ad blocking via your own Linux hardware. Block ads for all devices.

templates.name: AdGuard Home
templates.description: Network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking. Alternative to Pi-hole.

templates.name: Cloudflare Tunnel
templates.description: Expose your local services to the internet securely without opening ports.

templates.name: RabbitMQ
templates.description: RabbitMQ is a reliable and mature messaging broker with management UI.

templates.name: Apache Kafka
templates.description: Distributed event streaming platform for high-performance data pipelines.
templates.composeContent:
services:
  zookeeper:
    image: confluentinc/cp-zookeeper:latest
    environment:
      ZOOKEEPER_CLIENT_PORT: 2181
      ZOOKEEPER_TICK_TIME: 2000
    volumes:
      - zookeeper_data:/var/lib/zookeeper/data
      - zookeeper_log:/var/lib/zookeeper/log

  kafka:
    image: confluentinc/cp-kafka:latest
    depends_on:
      - zookeeper
    ports:
      - "9092:9092"
    environment:
      KAFKA_BROKER_ID: 1
      KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT: zookeeper:2181
      KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS: PLAINTEXT://localhost:9092
      KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR: 1
    volumes:
      - kafka_data:/var/lib/kafka/data

volumes:
  zookeeper_data:
  zookeeper_log:
  kafka_data:

templates.name: NATS
templates.description: High-Performance server for NATS.io, the cloud and edge native messaging system.

templates.name: Elasticsearch
templates.description: Distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine for all types of data.

templates.name: Meilisearch
templates.description: Lightning-fast, hyper-relevant search engine that fits effortlessly into your workflow.

templates.name: Adminer
templates.description: Database management in a single PHP file. Supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and more.

templates.name: pgAdmin
templates.description: The most popular and feature rich Open Source administration tool for PostgreSQL.

templates.name: phpMyAdmin
templates.description: A free software tool written in PHP, intended to handle the administration of MySQL.

templates.name: Mongo Express
templates.description: Web-based MongoDB admin interface written with Node.js and express.

templates.name: WordPress
templates.description: WordPress is open source software for creating websites, blogs, or apps.
templates.composeContent:
services:
  wordpress:
    image: wordpress:latest
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "8080:80"
    environment:
      WORDPRESS_DB_HOST: db
      WORDPRESS_DB_USER: wordpress
      WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD: changeme
      WORDPRESS_DB_NAME: wordpress
    volumes:
      - wordpress_data:/var/www/html
    depends_on:
      - db

  db:
    image: mariadb:11
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      MARIADB_DATABASE: wordpress
      MARIADB_USER: wordpress
      MARIADB_PASSWORD: changeme
      MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD: rootchangeme
    volumes:
      - wordpress_db:/var/lib/mysql

volumes:
  wordpress_data:
  wordpress_db:
